summary: The diff only shows changes to project_state.json, which is a metadata/tracking file. No changes to frontend/src/data/products.ts are visible in the diff, where the Viper Elite gaming mouse should be added according to REQ-17. The requirement to add the product entry with gaming specifications to the mice array is not evidenced in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new Viper Elite gaming mouse product entry to the mice array in frontend/src/data/products.ts with complete specifications including name, price, description, and gaming-relevant specs (DPI range, polling rate, sensor type, weight, connectivity, etc.)
missing_requirements.reason: The diff only shows changes to project_state.json. No modifications to frontend/src/data/products.ts are present in the diff, which is the required file for adding the Viper Elite mouse product entry.
